data.eml:eml: First Mexican species of the genus Cosberella (Collembola, Hypogastruridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Palacios-Vargas, Jose G., Castano-Meneses, Gabriela (2019): First Mexican species of the genus Cosberella (Collembola, Hypogastruridae). ZooKeys 829: 15-22, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.829.26730, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.829.26730
